item.title: DevEx Adventure
item.description: Developer Experience The adventure begins... Shay Nehmad for Angular Ventures, 2024 Developer Experience Who am I? Shay Nehmad Ex-Reco, currently doing Engineering Enablement & Experience @Orca Security Developer Experience Who are you? The adventure begins... Our quest today: understanding and improving the developer journey in your startup. Every decision will be a dice roll that impacts your journey. You'll learn how to defer hiring me for as long as you can ;)
